description.narrative: The project development objective is to improve rural connectivity, enhance road safety and strengthen road sector managementcapacity of the state of Rajasthan.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Bidding restriction/Safeguard Compliance | Description :Rajasthan to include in all civil works contracts theobligation of the relevant contractor to comply with the relevant Safeguard Documents applicable to such civil works. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Documents | Description :Rajasthan to implement the project in accordance with the FM Manual, theProcurement Manual, the GAAP and the Safeguard Documents. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Unit (PIU) | Description :Rajasthan to establish and maintain a District-specific PIU toassist the PMU with the carrying out of the day-to-day implementation of Project Activities in the respective District. | Frequency:CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Management Coordination | Description :Rajasthan to establish and maintain a project managementconsulting firm (“PMC”) to assist the PWD with Project planning and implementation. | Due Date :10-May-2014

Finance Agreement :Project Management System | Description :Rajasthan to maintain a management information system within the PWD;which system shall be computerized by no later than eighteen (18) months after the Effective Date, in a manner an substanceacceptable to the Association. | Due Date :02-Oct-2015
Finance Agreement :Project Management Unit (PMU) & Environmental and Social Management Cell (ESMC) | Description :Rajasthan tomaintain a PMU within the PWD, and an ESMC. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Surveys | Description :Rajasthan to carry out at least two (2) road user surveys with scope in orderassess road users’ satisfaction with Project results and its implementation, their opinions regarding current and potential sectortargets, and their behavioral/attitudinal changes. | Due Date :02-Apr-2015

Finance Agreement :Project Working Group | Description :Rajasthan to establish and maintain a Project Working Group to providetechnical support to the road safety cell (Component C) of the Transport Department and coordinate inter-agency cooperation. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Road Safety Cell | Description :Rajasthan to maintain a Project Road Safety Cell within the PWD, headed by theChief Engineer (PWD), to implement various road safety activities. | Due Date :02-May-2014

Finance Agreement :Road Sector Modernization Task Force | Description :Rajasthan to maintain a Road Sector Modernization Task forthe implementation of Component B of the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Reporting/disclosure | Description :Rajasthan to compile and furnish to the Association after the endof each calendar semester all the social and environmental documentation prepared by during that semester and publicly disclose thesummary of these Safeguard Documents at least 30 days prior to respective bidding invitation. | Frequency :Quarterly

title.narrative: Computerization of key business processes in PWD
Number of rural people with access to an all-season road
Share of rural population with access to an all-season road
Cost effective technologies piloted for road design and construction and upgradation/maintenance of existing gravel roads
Road safety policy and action plan approved and implemented
Average star rating achieved on model road safety corridor(s)
A reduction in annual average fatality count of road users on model road safety corridors

baseline.value: Existing system not user-friendly and not in use

target.value: Road Asset Management System developed and in use

actual.value: REOIs for System Provider Consultant (SPC) on Feb 22, 2018

title.narrative: Sector Policy and Financing Framework developed
Training Plan and HR Policy & Procedures developed
